Package com.ooad.hw1.engine

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.ooad.hw1.engine.Sprite
com.ooad.hw1.engine.Collidable
com.ooad.hw1.engine.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Collidable
Enemy class used to represent obstacles/monsters. It extends Collidable class, so it can be collided with any other collidable objects.

      Public constructor for Enemy object
      Parameters:
      x - image's x-axis location
      y - image's x-axis location
      speed - speed of the object when it moves
      height - pixel height of the image
      width - pixel width of the image
      imagePath - image's path

  • Method Details

    • CollisionAction

      protected void CollisionAction(Character character)
      Description copied from class: Collidable
      When collision happens there must be some actions to take on. Implement this method to do what function you want to enable on Character object
      Specified by:
      CollisionAction in class Collidable
      Parameters:
      character - object that collided with this current object.

    • isCollected

      public boolean isCollected()
      Getter for collected variable. Used to check if the main character collected it's score from this object.
      Returns:
      collected boolean

    • setCollected

      public void setCollected(boolean collected)
      Setter for collected variable. When main character collects score from this object, it is set to false.
      Parameters:
      collected - new collected status
